ingredients.ingredient: 3 tablespoons pure maple syrup, or more to taste

cookingTips: Toast pecans over medium heat to bring out natural oils and deepen flavor
Stir constantly once maple syrup is added to ensure even coating and prevent burning
Spread on parchment paper immediately after cooking to cool and prevent clumping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on the balance between toasting nuts to release flavor and preventing burning, and how to achieve a glazed coating without crystallization.
